entries.meaning: The mortality resulting from lethal wintry conditions among a human, animal, and/or vegetal population.

verbs.description: winterkill (third-person singular simple present winterkills, present participle winterkilling, simple past and past participle winterkilled)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To kill by the conditions of winter, especially the effect of the cold, freezing.
(intransitive) To die from the above effects of winter conditions.
